sources.full: Elden Ring: Adventures in The Lands Between

entries.name: Age
entries: Living jars do not age physically, but over many centuries their pottery may decay and require repair.

entries.name: Size
entries: Living Jars can vary greatly in size. You are Small, Medium, Large or Huge; you choose the size when you select this race.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Blindsight
entries: Lacking eyes, a nose, ears, a tongue and skin, you cannot sense as usual. You cannot be blinded, and can perceive your surroundings within 120 feet of you. You are considered blind beyond this radius.

entries.name: Fallen Warriors
entries: You gain proficiency in one weapon, skill or tool of your choice. When you finish a long rest, you can add the flesh of a dead humanoid to your own to change this proficiency to another.

entries.name: Potted Purpose
entries: You are a jar. You gain the following benefits:

items: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}, and you have resistance to poison damage.
You don't need to eat, drink, or breathe.
You don't need to sleep, and magic can't put you to sleep. You can finish a long rest in 4 hours if you spend those hours in an inactive, motionless state, during which you retain consciousness.

entries.name: Self-Repair
entries: You are proficient in {@item Potter's tools|phb}. In order to spend hit dice at the end of a short rest, you must have potter's tools on your person.

entries.name: Spin
entries: Your unique shape allows you to spin. If you move 20 feet or more on your turn while spinning, you can end your movement by slamming into a creature, causing it to take {@damage 1d4} bludgeoning damage. This damage increases by {@damage 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d4}), 11th level ({@damage 3d4}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d4}).

spell.name: Glintstone Pebble
entries: You launch a magical projectile at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d4} force damage.

You can fire more projectiles when you reach higher levels: two at 5th level, three at 11th level, and four at 17th level. You can direct the projectile at the same target or at different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each projectile.
The most basic glintstone sorcery of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
This is a universal first step on the journey to true knowledge of sorcery.

spell.name: Starlight
entries: You create a small, floating star-like light that stays above your head out to a range of {@dice 1d3} feet and moves with you. Until the spell ends, the starlight sheds blue-hued bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
Granted to sorcerers who depart from the academy to embark on journeys. Even during the blackest nights, sojourns underground, or imprisonment in gaol, the stars are never far from a sorcerer's side.

spell.name: Briars of Sin
entries: You summon thorns from a whorl of your own blood. You take {@damage 1d6} damage, and each creature in a 10-foot radius sphere originating from you must make a Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 2d12} necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage you take increases by {@scaledice 1d6|1-9|1d6}, and the damage dealt increases by {@scaledice 2d12|1-9|1d12} for each slot level above 1st.
An aberrant sorcery discovered by exiled criminals. Theirs are the sorceries most reviled by the academy.

spell.name: Carian Slicer
entries: You conjure a magic sword and deliver a swift slash. Make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of you. On a hit, the creature takes {@damage 1d10} + your spellcasting ability modifier slashing damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can make an additional attack for each slot level above 1st.
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
Even among the Carian sword sorceries, this is a notably effective technique.

spell.name: Frozen Armament
entries: A nonmagical weapon you are holding becomes a magic weapon. For the duration, the weapon deals an extra {@damage 1d4} cold damage when it hits. When a creature takes this cold damage, it must make a Constitution saving throw. Upon failure, it is {@condition frostbitten|TheLandsBetween} until the end of your next turn. If you stop holding the weapon, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the bonus to damage rolls increases to {@damage 2d4}. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the bonus increases to {@damage 3d4}.
Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch.
The snowy crone taught the young Ranni to fear the dark moon as she imparted her cold sorcery.

spell.name: Glintstone Arc
entries: You fire a horizontal arc of magic that spreads outward. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d6} force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d6|1-9|1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
Granted to sorcererers who depart from the academy to embark on journeys, in order to fend off large groups of would-be adversaries. Fools often roam in packs.

spell.name: Glintstone Icecrag

components.m: a piece of Glintstone and a small shard of ice

entries: You launch a mass of cold magic towards a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} cold damage, and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it is {@condition frostbitten|TheLandsBetween} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Constitution saving throw. On a success, it is no longer {@condition frostbitten|TheLandsBetween}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d8|1-9|1d8} for each slot level above 1st
Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch.
The snowy crone taught the young Ranni to fear the dark moon as she imparted her cold sorcery.

spell.name: Glintstone Stars
entries: You fire three magic shooting stars that pursue a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack for each star. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8} force damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you create one additional star for each slot level above 1st.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
A sorcery of the Olivinus Conspectus, which attracts sorcerers from Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

spell.name: Gravity Well
entries: You fire a projectile of condensed gravitational force towards a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} force damage. If the target is Large or smaller or is an object weighing less than 500 pounds, it is pulled 10 feet towards you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the distance a creature is pulled increases by 5 feet and the damage increases by {@scaledice 2d8|1-9|1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.
A gravitational technique studied by the young Radahn. His master was an Alabaster Lord with skin of stone.

spell.name: Magic Downpour
entries: You summon a mass of magic that fires a volley of projectiles over a wide area. Every creature in a 60-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d4} force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 3d4|1-9|1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
Said to have been taught by the Crystalians to mark the swearing of the old concord.

spell.name: Magic Glintblade
entries: You create a sigil above you, no more than 5 feet higher than your head. At the start of your next turn, a glintblade emerges from the sigil and fires at the nearest hostile creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes {@damage 4d6} force damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 4d6|1-9|1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
An old sorcery of the Carian Royal Family.
Said to be the prototype of the sword-phalanx sorceries wielded by royal enchanted knights.

spell.name: Night Maiden's Mist
entries: You create a 10-foot-radius sphere of life-sapping silver mist centered on a point within range. The mist spreads around corners, and its area is lightly obscured. The mist lingers in the air for the duration.
Each creature that starts its turn in the mist takes {@damage 2d4} necrotic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 2d4|1-9|1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
Below Sellia, the Eternal City of Nokron sleeps. This sorcery originates from the maiden of that place.

spell.name: Scholar's Armament
entries: A nonmagical weapon you are holding becomes a magic weapon. For the duration, the weapon has a bonus to its damage rolls equal to your spellcasting ability modifier. The added damage is force damage. If you stop holding the weapon, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or higher, the bonus to damage rolls increases to {@damage 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the bonus increases to {@damage 2d4} + your spellcasting modifier.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
Taught to the Knights of the Cuckoo by the academy as payment for their contract.

spell.name: Scholar's Shield
entries: A nonmagical shield you are holding becomes magical, granting you +2 to your AC and Dexterity saving throws for the duration. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC. In addition, while this spell is active, you can use your reaction to halve any damage received from spells or magical effects. If you stop holding the shield, the spell ends.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
Taught to the Knights of the Cuckoo by the academy as payment for their contract.

spell.name: Shatter Earth
entries: You imbue your arcane focus with magic, then thrust it into the ground, creating a magical shockwave. Each creature in a 10-foot radius sphere originating from you must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 2d8} thunder damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.
On your next turn, you can choose to use your action to create another shockwave.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 2d8|1-9|1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
A Stonedigger sorcery used by the glintstone miners of the crystal tunnel. At the academy, use of this sorcery was a stigma that marked out failed scholars.

spell.name: Swift Glintstone Shard
entries: You quickly launch a magic projectile at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d4} force damage.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
Those unworthy of the stone crown typically end their brief journey into sorcery here.

spell.name: Unseen Blade
entries: A weapon you are holding becomes invisible, granting you a bonus to attack rolls you make with the weapon equal to your spellcasting ability modifier against creatures that cannot see it. This lasts for the duration or until you stop holding the weapon.
One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
Used by Sellian assassins to present themselves as unarmed sorcerers.

spell.name: Briars of Punishment
entries: You wound yourself with thorns of punishment, sending a line of bloodthorns 60 feet long and 5 feet wide across the ground out from you in a direction you choose. You take {@damage 1d8} piercing damage, and every creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 4d8} piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage dealt by the line increases by {@scaledice 4d8|2-9|1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.
An aberrant sorcery discovered by exiled criminals. Theirs are the sorceries most reviled by the academy.
The guilty, their eyes gouged by thorns, lived in eternal darkness. There, they discovered the blood star.

spell.name: Carian Retaliation

time.condition: which you take when you are hit with a spell attack

entries: As a reaction to being hit with a spell attack, you can quickly gesture to dispel the incoming magic.

You reduce the damage of the attack by {@damage 1d10} + your spellcasting ability modifier, and can retaliate with summoned glintblades by making three ranged spell attacks against any creature within 30 feet of you. The glintblades deal {@damage 1d6} + your spellcasting modifier force damage on a hit.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage reduced increases by {@scaledice 2d10|2-9|1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
This was the Carian royal family's secret means to prepare against the disloyalty of the academy. The moon and stars would one day go their separate ways.

spell.name: Crystal Burst
entries: You fire a burst of glintstone crystal shards. Every creature in a 15-foot cone originating from you takes {@damage 4d4} force damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 4d4|2-9|1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
A sorcery of the Crystal Cadre, a group of sorcerers who pursued the wisdom of stone - the secrets locked in the faint cogitation of the Crystalians.

spell.name: Freezing Mist
entries: You create a 10-foot-radius sphere of cold mist centered on a point within range. The mist spreads around corners, and its area is lightly obscured. The mist lingers in the air for the duration.

Each creature that starts its turn in the mist must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it takes {@damage 4d6} cold damage and is {@condition frostbitten|TheLandsBetween} until the end of its next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 4d6|2-9|1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch.
The snowy crone taught the young Ranni to fear the dark moon as she imparted her cold sorcery.

spell.name: Glintblade Phalanx
entries: You form an arc of five magic glintblades overhead. Whenever a hostile creature ends its turn within 15 feet of you, it is struck by a glintblade. Make a ranged spell attack against the creature. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6} + your spellcasting modifier force damage.
The glintblades last for the duration or until all five of them are used.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 1d6|2-9|1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
Bestowed upon the enchanted Carian knights, who combined this art with their swordsmanship to maintain pressure upon their foes, striking in waves of steel and sorcery.

spell.name: Great Glintstone Shard
entries: You launch a large magical projectile towards a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 5d8} force damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 5d8|2-9|1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
Those unworthy of the stone crown typically end their brief journey into sorcery here.

spell.name: Lucidity
entries: When you cast this spell, you lose all levels of frenzied madness and magic can't put you to sleep for the duration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases to 1 hour.
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
The Carian knights never waver.

spell.name: Magma Shot
entries: You fire a lump of magma that explodes on contact towards a point within range. Every target within a 5-foot radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes {@damage 5d6} fire damage on failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
For the duration, any surfaces in the area are covered in magma. A creature that enters the area for the first time on its turn or starts its turn there takes {@damage 1d6} fire damage

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage of the initial explosion increases by {@scaledice 5d6|2-9|1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
One of the sorceries developed from the magma of Mt. Gelmir.
After discovering the ancient hexes of Gelmir, Rykard, son of Queen Rennala, brought them back into practical use as new forms of sorcery.

spell.name: Night Shard
entries: You swiftly fire a semi-invisible magical projectile towards a creature or object within range. Creatures other than you cannot see the projectile. Make a ranged spell attack against the target at advantage. On a hit, the target takes 4d4 force damage. This damage can only be reduced by resistance and immunity.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 4d4|2-9|1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.
One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
The Sellian sorcerers were assassins, and it is said that they often hunted their fellows.

spell.name: Oracle Bubbles
entries: You produce several small bubbles that drift outward in a 30-foot cone for the duration. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes {@damage 2d4} thunder damage for every 5 feet it travels. At the start of your next turn, every creature in the cone takes {@damage 2d4} thunder damage and the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage (both initial and later) increases by {@scaledice 2d4|2-9|1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.
Sorcery of the claymen who served as priests in the ancient dynasty.
The claymen search for lost oracles within their bubbles.

spell.name: Rancorcall
entries: You summon three vengeful spirits that chase down a target creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack for each spirit. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage.

For each attack you miss, you can make another attack against the same creature at the start of your next turn as the spirits continue to pursue it. The creature must still be within range for you to make these attacks.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you summon one additional vengeful spirit for each slot level above 2nd.
Sorcery of the servants of Death.
Once thought lost, this ancient death hex was rediscovered by the necromancer Garris.

spell.name: Rock Blaster
entries: You imbue your arcane focus with magic, creating a magical drill in your hands. When you cast this spell, you can move up to your speed and make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of you. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d10} piercing damage.

On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to make this attack again or to thrust the drill into the ground, creating a magical shockwave and ending the spell. If you do not use either of these actions, the spell ends.

The shockwave forces each creature in a 10-foot radius sphere originating from you to make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 2d8} thunder damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage of the drill increases by {@scaledice 2d10|2-9|1d10} and the damage of the shockwave increases by {@scaledice 2d8|2-9|1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
An enhanced version of the glintstone miners' Stonedigger sorcery.

spell.name: Rock Sling
entries: You pull a clump of rocks from the earth and send them flying out in line 60 feet long and 10 feet wide. This spell works only if there is a surface within 5 feet of you.
Make three ranged spell attacks against the creature or object closest to you within the line. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} bludgeoning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you make one additional attack against the target for each slot level above 2nd.
One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.
A gravitational technique studied by the young Radahn. His master was an Alabaster Lord with skin of stone.

spell.name: Terra Magica
entries: You draw a sigil upon the ground beneath you that raises the strength of magic in a 10-foot radius sphere. Whenever a creature within the area rolls damage for a spell that it casts, the damage increases by one damage die.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the amount of damage dice increase for every 2 slot levels above 2nd; 2 extra dice at 4th level or higher, 3 extra dice at 6th level or higher, and 4 extra dice at at 8th level or higher.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Once, the sigil would be cast from the highest belfry of the academy, covering the entire institution's grounds. This spell allows such vivid experience of spell—casting success, it turns many a fledgling into a true sorcerer in a flash of newfound understanding.

spell.name: Thops' Barrier

time.condition: which you take when you are hit with a spell attack

entries: When a creature hits you with a melee weapon attack or ranged spell attack, you can use your reaction to deflect the attack using a magical forcefield. Roll an ability check using your spellcasting modifier. The DC is equal to the attack roll total of the attack that hit you.

If you succeed, the attack is turned into a miss. If the attack was a melee weapon attack, the creature that hit you is {@condition stunned} until the start of its next turn. While it is {@condition stunned}, the next melee weapon attack that hits it is a critical hit.
If you fail the ability check, the damage you take from the attack is doubled.
The lifelong pursuit of Thops the Bluntstone.

Future generations will learn. They will know the foolishness of the sneering sorcerers who ridiculed this theory, little realizing that it was in fact a discovery worthy of a new conspectus of the academy.

spell.name: Unseen Form
entries: You and one other creature you touch become translucent. For the duration, a creature affected by this spell has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks, and attack rolls made from more than 30 feet away from the creature have disadvantage.
In addition, while mounted, your mount gains the benefits of this spell as well.
One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
The Sellian assassins considered every option that aided their dirty work.

spell.name: Ambush Shard
entries: You launch a magical projectile that appears 10 feet behind a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d4} force damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 8d4|3-9|1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.
One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
The Sellian sorcerers were assassins, and it is said that they often hunted their fellows.

spell.name: Cannon of Haima
entries: You lob an explosive magic projectile that flies in an arc towards a point within range. Every creature within a 15-foot radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes {@damage 8d6} force damage on a failed save, of half as much damage on a successful one.
The projectile can be thrown over obstacles with a height of 15 feet or less, reaching a point behind it.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 8d6|3-9|1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
Drawn from the conspectus of Haima, the adjudicator of the academy, this sorcery employs might as a means to quell conflict.

spell.name: Carian Greatsword
entries: You conjure a magic greatsword and deliver a sweeping blow. Make a single melee spell attack targeting each creature within 10 feet of you. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 2d10} + your spellcasting ability modifier slashing damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 2d10|3-9|1d10} for each slot level above 3rd.
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
Armed with this spell, sorcerers gain the strength of knights, their loyalty sworn to the moon.

spell.name: Carian Piercer
entries: You conjure a magic greatsword and thrust it forward. Make a melee spell attack roll targeting each creature in a line 5 feet wide and 10 feet long. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d10} + your spellcasting ability modifier piercing damage. If it is riding another creature, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 4d10|3-9|1d10} for each slot level above 3rd.
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
This sorcery forms a counterpart to Carian Greatsword. Highly lethal when used against single foes riding alone.

spell.name: Crystal Barrage
entries: You fire a barrage of glintstone crystal shards from your arcane focus in a line 60 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line takes {@damage 6d4} force damage.

On subsequent turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to continue firing. When you continue firing, you can choose to change the direction of the line. If you move or take another action, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 6d4|3-9|1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
A sorcery of the Crystal Cadre, a group of sorcerers who pursue the wisdom of stone - the secrets locked in the faint cogitation of the Crystalians.

spell.name: Fia's Mist
entries: You create a 10-foot radius sphere of deathly mist centered on a point within range. The mist spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. The mist lingers in the air for the duration.
Each humanoid that ends its turn in the mist must make a Constitution saving throw or suffer one level of {@condition deathblight|TheLandsBetween}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the radius of the sphere and the range of the spell both increase by 5 feet for each slot level above 3rd.
Sorcery of Fia, the Deathbed Companion.
This sorcery was developed to oppose the Roundtable Hold, and is effective only against the Tarnished.

spell.name: Gavel of Haima
entries: You conjure a magical greathammer and slam it down upon a creature within 5 feet of you. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d12} force damage.

Whether the attack hits or misses, every creature other than you within a 10 feet of the target must make a Dexterity saving throw as a magical shockwave emerges from the hammer's point of impact. A target takes {@damage 4d6} force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the initial damage increases by {@scaledice 4d12|3-9|1d12} and the damage of the shockwave increases by {@scaledice 4d6|3-9|1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
Drawn from the scholarly conspectus of Haima, the adjudicator of the academy, this sorcery employs might as a means to quell conflict.

spell.name: Great Oracular Bubble
entries: You create a giant magical bubble that drifts towards a target creature within range. For the duration, the bubble moves 30 feet towards the target at the end of each of its turns.
When the bubble enters the target's space, it bursts, dealing {@damage 12d4} thunder damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round and the damage increases by {@scaledice 12d4|3-9|1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.
Sorcery of the claymen who served as priests in the ancient dynasty.
The claymen search for lost oracles within their bubbles.

spell.name: Greatblade Phalanx
entries: You form an arc of three large glintblades overhead. Whenever a hostile creature ends its turn within 15 feet of you, it is struck by a glintblade. Make a ranged spell attack roll against the creature. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d12} + your spellcasting modifier force damage.
The glintblades last for the duration or until all three of them are used.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 3d12|3-9|1d12} for each slot level above 3rd.
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
Used by the enchanted troll knights. They were the comrades of the young Rennala, bound by oath.

spell.name: Loretta's Greatbow
entries: You summon a magic greatbow and fire a conjured arrow at a creature or object within 600 feet. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. If the target is more than 150 feet away, the attack roll has disadvantage. On a hit, the target takes {damage 6d6} force damage.
Alternatively, you can cast this spell using the {@action ready} action. If you choose to do so, the spell deals an additional {@damage 1d6} damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 3d12|3-9|1d12} for each slot level above 3rd.
Sorcery used by Royal Knight Loretta.
It is said that the bow was Loretta's favored weapon.

spell.name: Roiling Magma
entries: You fire a roiling lump of magma at a point within range. At the start of your next turn, the magma explodes. Every creature in a 20-foot radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes {@damage 7d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

After the magma explodes, any surfaces in the area are covered in magma for the duration. A creature that enters the area for the first time on its turn or starts its turn there must make a Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 1d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the initial damage increases by {@scaledice 7d6|3-9|1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.
One of the sorceries developed from the magma of Mt. Gelmir.
After discovering the ancient hexes of Gelmir, Rykard, son of Queen Rennala, brought them back into practical use as new forms of sorcery.

spell.name: Shard Spiral
entries: You create two projectiles that form a spiral as they travel in a line 60 feet long and 5 feet wide in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 4d6} force damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
If a target's size is Large or greater, it takes an additional {@damage 4d6} damage, which is also halved on a successful saving throw.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the initial damage increases by {@damage 4d6|3-9|1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
A sorcery of the Karolos Conspectus, the most venerable of the academy. This was the product of a failed attempt to create a new comet.

spell.name: Star Shower
entries: You fire six magic shooting stars that pursue a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack for each star. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8} force damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you create one additional star for each slot level above 3rd.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
The most difficult to master of the Olivinus Conspectus sorceries.

spell.name: Adula's Moonblade

components.m: a piece of Glintstone and a small shard of ice

entries: You conjure a cold magic greatsword and deliver a sweeping blow. Make a single melee spell attack targeting each creature within 10 feet of you. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 2d10} + your spellcasting ability modifier slashing damage.

A blade-like projectile of frost is then launched from the greatsword in a 20-foot-long, 15-foot-wide line. Each creature must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 1d10} cold damage and is {@condition frostbitten|TheLandsBetween} until the end of your next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition frostbitten|TheLandsBetween}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage of the greatsword and the projectile both increase by {@damage 3d10|4-9|1d10}.
Sorcery of Adula, the Glintstone Dragon.
Adula, a devourer of sorcerers, was bested by Ranni and subsequently swore a knightly oath to her Dark Moon.

spell.name: Carian Phalanx
entries: You form an arc of nine magic glintblades overhead. Whenever a hostile creature ends its turn within 15 feet of you, it is struck by a glintblade. Make a ranged spell attack against the creature. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6} + your spellcasting modifier force damage.
The glintblades last for the duration or until all nine of them are used.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@damage 1d6}.
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
An enhanced version of the glintblade sorcery used by enchanted knights.

spell.name: Collapsing Stars

components.m: a piece of Glintstone and a handful of meteoric rock

entries: You fire numerous gravitational projectiles towards a creature or object within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 6d8} force damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. A creature that is Large or smaller that fails the save is pulled 20 feet towards you. If the target is an object, it must weigh less than 1000 pounds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 6d8|4-9|1d6} for each slot above 4th.
One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.
A gravitational technique mastered by the young Radahn. {@italic "I thank you for your tutelage, for now I can challenge the stars."}

spell.name: Eternal Darkness (THIS SPELL IS WAY TOO STRONG, AIN'T NO WAY I'M ALLOWING IT IN ITS CURRENT STATE)

components.m: a piece of Glintstone and a handful of melted mushroom

entries: You create a space of darkness that draws in magic. For the duration, any spell of 3rd level or lower cast by a hostile creature that targets a creature or object within a 30-foot radius of you fails and has no effect. If the spell is 4th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the spell fails and has no effect.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the interrupted spell has no effect if its level is less than or equal to one level below the level of the spell slot you used.
Forbidden sorcery of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
Originally a lost sorcery of the Eternal City; the despair that brought about its ruin made manifest.

spell.name: Gelmir's Fury
entries: You conjure surging magma in a 20-foot radius around yourself. Every other creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes {@damage 5d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
On subsequent turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to continue conjuring magma in the same area. If you move or take another action, the spell ends.
One of the sorceries developed from the magma of Mt. Gelmir.
This sorcery is held to represent the fury of the volcano, but the arrogance of attempting to harness it is solely that of men and serpents.

spell.name: Glintstone Cometshard
entries: You fire a magical comet with a trailing tail in a line 60 feet long and 5 feet wide in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 8d6} force damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
Until the end of your next turn, any creature that enters the line for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there takes {@damage 1d6} force damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the initial damage increases by {@scaledice 8d6|4-9|1d6} for each slot above 4th.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
A sorcery of the Karolos Conspectus, the most venerable of the academy.

spell.name: Meteorite

components.m: a piece of Glintstone and a handful of meteoric rock

entries: You summon a void above your head that emits a rain of small meteorites over a wide area. Every creature in a 30-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes {@damage 5d6} bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
On subsequent turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to continue emitting meteorites in the same area. If you move or take another action, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 5d6|4-9|1d6} for each slot above 4th.
One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.
The sorcery originates from the Onyx Lords, who had skin of stone, and were called lords in reverential fear of their destructive power.

spell.name: Night Comet
entries: You fire a semi-invisible magic comet with a trailing tail in a line 60 feet long and 5 feet wide in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw at disadvantage. A creature takes {@damage 8d4} force damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. This damage can only be reduced by resistance and immunity.
Until the end of your next turn, any creature that enters the line for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there takes {@damage 1d4} force damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the initial damage increases by {@scaledice 8d4|4-9|1d4} for each slot above 4th.
One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
The Sellian sorcerers were assassins, and it is said that they often hunted their fellows.

spell.name: Tibia's Summons
entries: You summon a group of spectral skeletons to attack creatures around a point you choose within range. Make a melee spell attack against each creature of your choice in a 10-foot radius sphere centered on that point. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 4d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier slashing damage.

For the purpose of features that enhance undead you control, such as Undead Thralls from the School of Necromancy, these attacks count as a weapon attack made by an undead creature you control and created with this spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 4d6|4-9|1d6} for each slot above 4th.
Sorcery of the servants of Death.
The dead have long been left to wander; what they need is leadership.

spell.name: Zamor Ice Storm

components.m: a piece of Glintstone and an arcane focus

entries: You strike the ground with your arcane focus and summon a freezing tornado in a 20-foot radius around you. Every creature other than you in the area must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d6} cold damage and is {@condition frostbitten|TheLandsBetween} until the end of your next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and is not {@condition frostbitten|TheLandsBetween}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 6d6|4-9|1d6} for each slot above 4th.
Ice sorcery of the Town of Zamor.
Cloaked in icy tempests, the knights of Zamor have challenged the Fire Giants since ancient times.

spell.name: Ancient Death Rancor

components.m: a piece of Glintstone and an arcane focus

entries: You summon a swarming horde of vengeful spirits that chase down a target creature within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 10d8} necrotic damage.

If the creature succeeds the save, it takes no damage, but must repeat it again at the start of your next turn as the spirits continue to pursue it. The creature only repeats the saving throw if it is still within range

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 10d8|5-9|1d8} for each slot above 5th.
Sorcery of the servants of Death.
They are cinders of the ancient death hex, raked from the fires of ghostflame by Deathbirds.

spell.name: Crystal Release

components.m: a piece of Glintstone and a shard of cerulean crystal

entries: You create a mass of crystal above you and shatter it in a 30-foot radius around yourself. Every creature in the area other than you must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 10d4} force damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 10d4|5-9|1d4} for each slot above 5th.
Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians.
This sorcery is used by high-ranking adepts among the Crystalians. Some also call this sorcery "the Crystal Sun."

spell.name: Shattering Crystal

components.m: a piece of Glintstone and a shard of cerulean crystal

entries: You shatter a mass of crystal out to a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 10d4} force damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 10d4|5-9|1d4} for each slot above 5th.
Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians.
The Crystalians are inorganic beings, yet they live. They cleave close to the ideals of the primeval current, and as such, they are revered guests of the sorcerers.

spell.name: Stars of Ruin
entries: You fire ten dark stars that pursue a creature within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. It takes {@damage 10d8} force damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 10d8|5-9|1d8} for each slot above 5th.
Legendary sorcery devised by Lusat, primeval sorcerers.
When Lusat glimpsed into the primeval current, he beheld the final moments of a great star cluster, and upon seeing it, he too was broken.

spell.name: Crystal Torrent

components.m: a piece of Glintstone and an arcane focus

entries: You fire a mass of crystal shards from your arcane focus in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line has to make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 11d6} force damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

On subsequent turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to continue firing. When you continue firing, you can choose to change the direction of the line. If you move or take another action, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 11d6|6-9|1d6} for each slot above 6th.
Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians.
The wrath of the Crystalians encapsulated in sorcery. Each shard is of substantial size, making even a stray blow capable of inflicting a severe wound.

spell.name: Explosive Ghostflame
entries: You strike the ground with your arcane focus, triggering a great explosion of ghostflame that burns all creatures in a 60-foot radius around yourself. Every creature in the area other than you must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 6d8} necrotic and {@damage 6d8} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
Until the end of your next turn, ghostflame burns surfaces in the area. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage for every 5 feet it travels.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the initial necrotic damage increases by {@scaledice 6d8|6-9|1d8} for each slot above 6th.
Sorcery of the servants of Death.
In the time when there was no Erdtree, death was burned in ghostflame. Deathbirds were the keepers of that fire.

spell.name: Loretta's Mastery
entries: You summon a magic greatbow and fire four conjured arrows, firing them at creatures within range. Each target must be within 15 feet of another, and a single target cannot be hit by more than 2 arrows. Make a ranged spell attack roll for each arrow. If the target is more than 150 feet away, the attack roll has disadvantage. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 5d6} force damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 5d6|6-9|1d6} for each slot level above 6th.
Sorcery used by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree.
Developed by Loretta after her long, bloody journey to seek out a place where the Albinaurics could live in peace.

spell.name: Rykard's Rancor
entries: You summon a searing spirit that leaves behind a trail of delayed explosions. It travels in a line 60 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature within 10 feet of the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes {@damage 10d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one
Every creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the end of the line takes an additional {@damage 4d6} fire damage, which is also halved on a successful saving throw.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the initial damage increases by {@scaledice 10d6|6-9|1d6} for each slot level above 6th.
The terrible power of Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy.

These spirits manifest from the rancor of heroes who met a violent end. The lord granted them an audience, whereupon they were welcomed by the maw of the great serpent -- and within the serpent's bowels, they became the lord's kin.

spell.name: Comet
entries: You fire a great magical comet in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 12d6} force damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. If a creature that failed the save is Medium or smaller, it is knocked {@condition prone}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 12d6|8-9|1d6} for each slot level above 7th.
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
The greatest of the Karolos Conspectus's sorceries, that only a very few sorcerers have ever mastered.

spell.name: Founding Rain of Stars
entries: You summon a dark cloud of stars in a 40-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within range. Until the spell ends, every creature that enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must make a Dexterity saving throw as a flood of star rain falls upon them. A creature takes {@damage 10d10} force damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 10d10|8-9|1d10} for each slot level above 7th.
The eldest primeval sorcery, said to have been discovered by an ancient astrologer. A sorcery of legendary status.
Thought to be the founding glintstone sorcery. The glimpse of the primeval current that the astrologer saw became real, and the stars' amber rained down on this land.

spell.name: Meteorite of Astel
entries: You summon a void above your head that emits a hail of many large meteorites over a wide area. Every creature in a 90-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes {@damage 8d6} bludgeoning damage on failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
On subsequent turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to continue emitting meteorites in the same area. If you move or take another action, the spell ends.
One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.
A manifestation of the power with which Astel leveled the Eternal City.

spell.name: Comet Azur
entries: You fire a powerful comet in a torrent, channeling the power of the origin of glintstone within the Primeval Current in a line 150 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 10d10} force damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

On subsequent turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to continue firing. When you continue firing, you can choose to change the direction of the line. If you move or take another action, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 9th level, the damage increases by {@scaledice 10d10|8-9|2d10}.
Legendary sorcery devised by Azur, primeval sorcerer.
When Azur glimpsed into the primeval current, he saw darkness. He was left both bewitched and fearful of the abyss.

spell.name: Rennala's Full Moon
entries: You lift into the air and become the vessel of the full moon, summoning it upon yourself and sending it floating towards a point within range. It travels in a line 15 feet wide and as long as the distance between yourself and the chosen point. Until the start of your next turn, the area is under an effect similar to the {@spell Antimagic Field} spell.

At the start of your next turn, the moon reaches the point and explodes in a 40-foot-radius sphere. Every creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes {@damage 12d12} force damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. This damage cannot be reduced in any way.
A creature that has resistance or immunity to force damage that is damaged by this spell loses its resistance or immunity until it completes a long rest.
Sorcery associated with the Carian queen.
Queen Rennala encountered this enchanting moon when she was young, and later, it would bewitch the academy.

spell.name: Ranni's Dark Moon
entries: You lift into the air and become the vessel of a cold, dark moon, summoning it upon yourself and sending it floating towards a point within range. It travels in a line 15 feet wide and as long as the distance between yourself and the chosen point. Until the start of your next turn, the area is under an effect similar to the {@spell Antimagic Field} spell.

At the start of your next turn, the moon reaches the point and explodes in a 40-foot-radius sphere. Every creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes {@damage 8d12} force damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. This damage cannot be reduced in any way. If a creature fails this saving throw, it is {@condition frostbitten|TheLandsBetween} for one hour
A creature that has resistance or immunity to force damage that is damaged by this spell loses its resistance or immunity until it completes a long rest.
Legendary sorcery associated with the Carian queen.
This moon was encountered by a young Ranni, led by the hand of her mother, Rennala. What she beheld was cold, dark and veiled in occult mystery.

spell.name: Beast Claw
entries: You create shockwaves in the shape of a bestial claw in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d12} slashing damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: The spell's damage increases by 1d12 when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d12}), 11th level ({@damage 3d12}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d12}).
Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
This incantation represents the fury of Gurranq, his bestial nature returned, as much as it does his restless agitation.

spell.name: Bestial Constitution
entries: You fill your body with bestial vigour, ending the {@condition frostbitten|TheLandsBetween} condition on yourself. For the duration, you are immune to being {@condition frostbitten|TheLandsBetween} and resistant to piercing damage.
Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
Having gained intelligence, the beasts must have felt how their wildness slipped away as civilization took hold.

spell.name: Bestial Sling
entries: You hurl a number of sharp rocks. Choose one creature you can see within range, or choose two creatures you can see within range that are within 5 feet of each other. Make a ranged spell attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 1d8} piercing damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: The spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d8}), 11th level ({@damage 3d8}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d8}).
Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
It is said that in the time before the Erdtree, stones were the first weapons of the beasts who had gained intelligence.

spell.name: Catch Flame
entries: You attempt to quickly scorch a nearby creature you try to touch. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d12} fire damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: The spell's damage increases by 1d12 when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d12}), 11th level ({@damage 3d12}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d12}).
Incantation originating from a sinister prophecy.
The flame of ruin is anathema to the Erdtree. But prophets sometimes glimpse it within the faith all the same. Sadly when this occurs their sole reward is banishment.

spell.name: Assassin's Approach
entries: You shroud your body in soft silence. For the duration, you are immune to damage taken from falling unless the damage would reduce you to 0 hit points. Additionally, your footsteps produce no sound, giving you advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide from creatures that cannot see you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can maintain your concentration on this spell for one hour.
Incantation of the Two Fingers' servants, who once served as the assassins of the Roundtable Hold.
The assassins were charged with eliminating Tarnished who had strayed from guidance.

spell.name: Discus of Light
entries: You fire a ring of light forwards in a line 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 2d8} radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
At the start of your next turn, the disc returns to you, causing each creature in the line to make the same saving throw.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledice 2d8|1-9|1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
A gift from the young Miquella to his father, Radagon.

items: A frostbitten creature's speed is halved.
The creature can take its action or bonus action, not both.
Regardless of the creature’s abilities or magic items, a frostbitten creature can’t make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn.
If a frostbitten creature takes fire damage, the condition ends.

condition.name: Deathblight
entries: Some creatures and objects can cause a special condition called deathblight. Deathblight is measured in six levels. An effect can give a creature one or more levels of deathblight, specified in the effect's description.
Deathblight levels have no effect until a creature has 6 levels, at which point it dies.
If a creature with a level of deathblight suffers another effect that causes deathblight, its current level of deathblight increases by the amount specified in the effect's description.
Finishing a short or long rest removes all deathblight levels from a creature.
